ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, everybody, I have created a new, kind of unique RPG.  It started based on two characters made from deep in my mind.  Anyway, they are called the Creature

Ok, everybody, I have created a new, kind of unique RPG.  It started based =
on two characters made from deep in my mind.  Anyway, they are called the C=
reature and the Flare, usually just called Creature and Flare.  They are ba=
sed on real people in my life(namely, myself and my sweetheart, hehe.)  And=
, see, you make up a character, be it a wizard, futuristic cyborg, robot, k=
night, giant mouse, god or goddess, whatever, just follow a couple rules an=
d have fun!  Anyway, check it out, at http://groups.yahoo.com/group/creatur=
eflare.
